scripts.imagemin: imagemin img/* -o dist/img && imagemin img/gallery/* -o dist/img/gallery
scripts.usemin: usemin contact.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contact.html && usemin tea.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/tea.html && usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin locations.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/locations.html && usemin menu.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/menu.html && usemin attractions.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/attractions.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
